text: Modrzejewski (feminine Modrzejewska) is a Polish surname. Notable people include: * Helena Modrzejewska (1840-1909), Polish actress * Joseph Mélèze- Modrzejewski (1930-2017), Polish-French historian * Robert J. Modrzejewski (born 1934), American military officer * Rudolf Modrzejewski (1861-1940), Polish-American civil engineer Category:Polish-language surnames
title: Modrzejewski
